nodes.text: The Morturia system was a star system that was located in the Relgim sector, within the Outer Rim Territories and New Territories regions of the galaxy. The system was the origin point of the Morturian energy disk weapon.
The Morturia system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square L-4.
